scripts.jupyter-html-index: docker run --rm -v "$(pwd):/data" -w /data -u root jupyter/nbviewer jupyter nbconvert --to html --output "index.html"
scripts.jupyter-html-story: docker run --rm -v "$(pwd):/data" -w /data -u root jupyter/nbviewer jupyter nbconvert --to html --template basic --output "story.html"
